title: Patch 6.3 High Ping and Lag.
body:
Hello.

So ever since this patch came out, I haven't been able to play at all. I am from Mexico but I've always played in NA with a ping between 50-70 ms which has been fine for me, since I experience no delays on clicking. But since this patch came out, I've had a flat 180 ms ping non stop, and everything I click in game, takes a second or 2 to happen. I have also tested with my LAN account but the ping is the same.
I've read people complaining about lag spikes so I assume I'm probably not the only one, is there anyone experiencing this problem with this new patch, or is it just me?

RiotPLZ fix   {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{champion:32}}

replies.body: no its not just you. i've been having a massive ping. already reported to riot but still wont do anything. its been almost a week all of my games are 500ms highest ive got was around 4k i have screenshot just to prove it

I've normally experienced around 250ms on LoL but ever since patch 6.3 I've shot up to around 310ms or if I'm very lucky - 290ms. I live in SE Asia, but Garena is useless as the only way I can play is in a different language therefore I'm forced to play in servers on the other side of the world (such a stupid way to provide Asian players LoL, and it doesn't even work, in Malaysia's Garena, I'm still stuck with 200ms even with 30mb/s internet and Singapore's won't even let more than half the community log in to their accounts.) Though this may be seen as shocking enough, not only has the latency gone up, but just general in game lag that makes no sense relating to the ms in the top right. RIOT please fix this ASAP or you'll be losing a very high paying member of your community and maybe even more. Disappointing to see my ms go UP even more in patch 6.4. :(
Might as well switch to fuckin playing SMITE or DotA 2. Your loss Riot.

Tried all of Riot's fix ideas. Been having ping spikes since 6.1. I'll be in game and my ping will shoot up from 37-38 to 260ish, then slowly start dropping back down to normal only to do it in again in another minute (or less).
youre not the only one. this game is unplayable. tried playing dotA and it works fine. i recommend to play dotA instead of this shitty as game
Exactly my situation most of the time.
for fuck sakes riot as if 2k ping isnt enough. thanks for giving me 6k ping

Literally every patch is like playing Russian roulette, only it's lag roulette and I have to hope that the game doesn't lag out of control. LoL is probably by FAR the worst game I have ever dealt with when it comes to lag issues. No other game I've played even comes close to the amount of lag issues that LoL keeps having. I went from having 13 ping to 70-80 ping after the server move. Now I'm sitting at an awesome 180-250 ping. This game is literally unplayable for me right now.

I've been having this problem too,
 I reported to Riot and they told me to download a bunch of useless apps, and then, after about 7 replies from each side, they told me to contact my network provider -_- while it only happens in LoL

Its true, i have perma 70 MS with my optic 150mb/s internet

my normal ping before the patch release is 20

Same here my ping is at 80 - 90 and it remains so the entire time in all the online games the connection stable and just fine once i launch lol and join a game the ping instantly jumps up to 150 then esclate with time 150 ~ 160 ~ 170 ~ 300 ghost minions slow movment insane lag dont know what to do

Guys, you all are right. I've been feeling the EXACT same issue. I knew I wasn't the only one. Since the new patches, (6.xxx), I've been feeling this unplayable lag. I've contacted Riot Support and I've followed the assistance guides, and nothing; I'm quite desperate, because I have more than 3 years playing this game, and this is by far the worst issues I've ever had. I contacted also my ISP and they said nothing was wrong. You know what's the worst part? That I play with 80-90 ms and 50-60 FPS, and it shows me that in the info on the top right corner. And when I try to do whatever kind of match, I can't play! It seems like if I were playing +2000 ms and 20 FPS. (And I can see what others do! And it still shows me the "80 ms and 60 FPS.).
So, please we beg for assistance. Not only for pro players, but for the ones that just wanna have fun.

I'm getting this too, everynight around 7pm pacific I start shooting up to 130+ sometimes 200+. I checked my connection to make sure it wasn't my net and I had no packet loss or buffering. Really frustrating.

Hey Eress and evoXelly, 

I have been scouring the boards and seen some players talking about this issue. Have you guys happened to try Riot's Connection KB yet? It sometimes helps with high ping and lag: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues

If you go through the steps and that doesn't seem to work for you, I suggest you send in a ticket to Riot support for extra help.
